docs.lead_paragraph: Type 2 diabetics can significantly lower their blood sugar — and lose body fat in the bargain — with an exercise program that combines aerobics and weight lifting, a new study reports.

headline.seo: Aerobics and Weight Lifting Help Control Type 2 Diabetes
headline.main: Exercise: For Type 2 Diabetes, 2 Types of Training
headline.print_headline: EXERCISE: For Type 2 Diabetes, 2 Types of Training

docs.snippet: Type 2 diabetics can significantly lower their blood sugar — and lose body fat in the bargain — with an exercise program that combines aerobics and weight lifting, a new study reports.
